TerrainGenerator.comment: This is the settings for the Legacy terrainGenerator to generate terrain

NewTerrainGen.comment: New terrain generation thanks to jeyfella, link in README.

SaveFile.comment: See StoragePaths to tweak where the save Files are located

NewTerrainGen.oresComment: All Paths are relative to the ones defined above, for example, a model path of 'ironOre.fbx' would become 'data/models/ironOre.fbx' (if using default configs

Server.comment: This is the settings for the server, including max Players, IP, port, whitelist, blacklist

AWS.comment: If not using AWS for heightmap shareing, set useAws to false, the server will then share the heightmap over the websocket connection (CAUTION: This requires a high bandwidth as the heightmap is a very large file and can easily be over a gigabyte)
